title: Anyone else use Optus cable internet services and recently find League ping consistently higher?
body:
Melbourne area
Never used to have constant issues. Now constant 78 ping around 5-11pm, up from 25 ping. Packet loss occurring during this time also.
Discord shows 23 ping constantly throughout this phase

replies.body:
Considering you posted this 12 hours ago, and LoL OCE has had an "Optus issue" flag up for all players, for like a week, I'd say you're in the wrong boat buddy.

And lmao, 78 ping is nothing. I can totally carry (S grade) on 78 ping. Try 300+ then complain.
